meta.title: Mylog
meta.description: Mylog.ru â€” the most interesting place on the Internet. Platform for publishing content on various themes. All in one place.
meta.keywords: publish news tech learning reading read book

landingPage.name: Mylog
landingPage.subtitle0:
Be a part of our platform for reading and writing compelling content
from talented writers from around the world.
landingPage.title1: Platform for Reading and Writing Content
landingPage.features: Features that make our platform ideal for creating and consuming content
landingPage.feature0:
Interface

Easily navigate and access content with our intuitive interface
landingPage.feature1:
Community

Connect with other writers and readers from around the world
landingPage.feature2:
Tools

Use our writing tools to create beautiful and easy to read content
landingPage.title2: Discover a world of stories waiting to be written and read
landingPage.subTitle2: Start sharing your own stories or explore the works of others on our platform.

registrationPage.title: Registration
registrationPage.afterSignUpMessage: Check your email for confirmation registration

changePasswordPage.title: Change password
changePasswordPage.afterChangeMessage: Now you can sign in with new password

confirmRegistrationPage.title: Your registration is completed
confirmRegistrationPage.content: Your account is enabled. You can sign in by your email and password

resetPasswordPage.title: Reset password
resetPasswordPage.content: Enter your email and we will send you a link to reset your password

profilePage.title: Profile
profilePage.nicknameToolTip: The nickname must begin with @ and can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores.
profilePage.resetPasswordMessage: We sended you a link to reset your password

deleteDialog.title: Are you sure?
deleteDialog.content: You won't be able to revert this!

editPreviewDialog.title: Preview
editPreviewDialog.hint: Write a short description of your publication. Maximum 255 characters

searchPage.message:
To search for authors, use the prefix @.
To search for tags use prefix #.

published.title: Are you ready to publish this publication?
published.content:
You can't edit this publication after publishing.
You'll need to unpublish it first.

draft.title: Do you want to unpublish this publication?
draft.content: After editing, you must submit it for review again.

viewContentPage.pendingHint: This publication will be published after approval
viewContentPage.shareText: Check out this publication on Mylog

editContentPage.published: This publication is published! Unpublish it to edit
editContentPage.pendingHint: This publication will be published after approval
editContentPage.tagHint: Tags will help to find your publication. Tags added by one, press Enter to add tag

badGatewayPage.title: We are working on the update, we apologize for the inconvenience.

firstLaunchTitle:
We're glad you are here!
We use cookies for better experience.

errors.emailHelp: Forgot password? Go to link for reset password
errors.sessionExpired: Session expired, please sign in again
errors.passwordHelp: Password must contain at least 1 digit, 1 lowercase letter, 1 uppercase letter, 1 special symbol (#@%&+) and be longer than 8 characters
